trends: There have been no other sightings in Monclova

divs: Sighting DetailsMy siting took place in a car while initially following the object and thenlater being followed by the same object. This occurred somewhere around 530 pm.That night, a local radio station, WIOT, indicated that many motorists in theDetroit MI area had also reported being followed by a similar object around 1100that same evening.If interested, I will be happy to provide a more detailed narrative at anothertime.
